status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b0nv1","text":"Seed the hela cells the day before the treatment day in 6 well plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61r2j","text":"The next day, make sure the seeded cells are spreading out (not concentrated in the middle of the well because this can affect the results).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jksk","text":"Aspirate off the old media and treat each well with   of growth media containing   Antimycin A,   Oligomycin and   QVD for desired period.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":96,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":113,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"tvjb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8tdld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alcql","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"F077F310FE7E11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"050D9280FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"31064940FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"3AB6E850FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"4":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"f7hvs","text":"Note: Make sure all drugs are vortexed well, mix the media well after adding each drug.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7bt4k","text":"After the treatment, harvest the cells on ice by scraping.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gdbb","text":"Pre-chill eppies and 1x PBS on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9u8fv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jiqp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"973cn","text":"Note: I normally put all the plates that need harvesting into a fridge and harvest one by one on ice.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"algi8","text":"Aspirate the media thoroughly from the wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cq77a","text":"Wash the wells with   of cold 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"abajv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9nj0o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asop8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"814AAFE0FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bj03k","text":"Note: Make sure swirl around after adding the PBS to wash the cells properly.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1di4d","text":"Aspirate off the PBS and add another   of cold 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"B0302650FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8t7t","text":"Use a plastic cell scraper to scrape all the cells off the wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aobq7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9h8hr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"82eu8","text":"Note: I use one scraper for each well. You can wash and reuse them again.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ecar0","text":"Transfer the cells-containing PBS to eppies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"70blq","text":"Centrifuge the eppies at   for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D7230160FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"E1BEEAD0FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E6DE9010FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9910g","text":"Aspirate off PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de4s3","text":"Quickly centrifuge for   to spin down the residual PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"FE3635B0FE7F11EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ci3af","text":"Aspirate off all the PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2n7rt","text":"Lyse the cell pellets in lysis buffer and boil the samples at   with shaking for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7f239","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"51msb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uo8o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0C831930FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"99","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":420,"guid":"12F5A440FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"e37so","text":"Note: I use the plastic clips to make sure that the lids wonâ€™t pop during heating.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bht2","text":"Let the samples cool down and spin at max speed ( ) for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"28C79440FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"2EB55EF0FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

If they do, dilute with lysis buffer and reheat them for a couple of minutes at   with shaking.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"concentration":"6","error_concentration":false,"guid":"A265C3D0FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"concentration"},"1":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4D1259C0FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"99","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98ucj","text":"Aliquot  of each sample into a new eppie and add 1x LDS to make up to  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"DA923AE0FEA811EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"B89E64E0FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aslr9","text":"Set up the gel tank with MOPs buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13evm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"17s70","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"edhe8","text":"The inside chamber should be filled with 1x MOPs supplemented with antioxidants. The outside chamber doesnâ€™t need antioxidants.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2esh1","text":"Wash each well with a glass syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ftmh","text":"Load markers and samples into the wells and run at 100V for   and 190V for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"D7D3BE50FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3300,"guid":"DAF1EE40FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qcg3","text":"Subject the gels to wet transfer onto PVDF membrane using cold NuPAGE transfer buffer containing 20% Methanol for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":119,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"EAB481D0FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EDAF9960FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tb6a","text":"After transfer, incubate the PVDF membrane with PVDF destain buffer on a shaker at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F708F0B0FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"FDF7B0A0FE8011EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"18tkq","text":"Wash three times with PBS/Tween ( 5 min each wash).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu7gr","text":"Block with blocking buffer for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"3C23FAF0FE8111EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"esimi","text":"Remove blocking buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5agjh","text":"Rinse twice with PBS/Tween and wash twice with PBS/Tween and once with 1x PBS (5 min for each wash).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brn9g","text":"Cut the PVDF membrane and put appropriate parts into different antibodies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79qr4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7u930","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"d9a9g","text":"Note: In this case, itâ€™s ACTIN (1/5000), COXII (1/1000) and Parkin (1/1000) antibodies made up in 3% BSA in PBS/Tween.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9el11","text":"Incubate on a   shaker  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b96ob","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eg461","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"75587350FE8111EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"631AF4E0FEA611ECBA9701E5897D2971","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"9a0a5","text":"Note: To make sure we donâ€™t lose antibodies, I wet the tubs with PBS/Tween before putting in the antibodies.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6590s","text":"The next day, recycle the antibodies back to their tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ett7u","text":"Wash the blots three times with PBS/Tween (5 min for each wash).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vl21","text":"Incubate with appropriate HRP-conjugated secondary antibodies made up in blocking buffer for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"BAA5FF40FE8111EC885C1F7997373A23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"duv5l","text":"Wash the blots twice with PBS/Tween, once with 1x PBS (5 min for each wash).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
